title: Unstoppable Love & Happiness
description: When Katie's second husband told her wanted pizza for dinner one night, she snaps. She packs her daughter, the dog and herself into her minivan and sets out to find the missing part of herself. Having failed at not one but two marriages she's dead set again dating, but when the van breaks down in Oklahoma and a hot cowboy swoops in to rescue her it takes all her effort to stick to her guns. Can she find herself again and a healthy relationship, or is she doomed to fail.
author: K. Fowler
